name: Mossanda

aura.name: grenadier_panda
aura.description: Can be ridden. Can rapidly fire a grenade launcher while mounted.

description: A Pal so powerful it's hard to believe. In one experiment, this Pal tore through 3,000 sheets of paper at once! It's only by some miracle that this Pal isn't a meat-eater.

skills.name: power_shot
skills.description: Charges energy into a focused blast.

skills.name: seed_machine_gun
skills.description: Fires a volley of hard seeds at enemies in front of it.

skills.name: stone_cannon
skills.description: Digs up a boulder and hurls it at an enemy.

skills.name: crushing_punch
skills.description: Mossanda's exclusive skill. Winds up its fist before striking an enemy with a devastating punch.

skills.name: seed_mine
skills.description: Launches a deadly seed. If it hits an enemy, the seed explodes.

skills.name: spine_vine
skills.description: Generates spiny thorns that chase an enemy along the ground, piercing them from below.

skills.name: solar_blast
skills.description: Charges solar energy before blasting enemies with a powerful beam.
